resources.string:
Hi, my name is Pornpat. 

I am Thai. Live in Pathum Thani, Thailand. 

I like coding and anything that relate to the computer. 
I choose to practice in Android application development because I had interested in Android for a long time. 

The first Android phone I had used is "Sony Ericsson - Live with Walkman". It was a great phone in that time! 
It has an additional button that let you launch the Walkman app immediately when you press it. 
In the past, many Android phones have some unique design on their own device. 
That's a great era of smartphone! I still want to see these happen again in the future. 

Now I'm graduated and looking for a job about Android Developer. 
But it isn't that easy because of the COVID-19 situation. I'm a little bit sad XD. 

 Anyway, Nice to meet you!
